languages.text: {n}Внезапно из вокс-системы мостика раздается оглушительный визг. Вы слышите настойчивые тирады искаженного бинарного кода, похожие на глухие смешки механизмов.{/n} "Л-л-л-лорд-капитан! Обна-на-наружены помехи в во-во-вокс-системе отсека. Похоже, мостик о-о-отрезало от остального к-к-корабля..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Внезапно из вокс-системы мостика раздается оглушительный визг. Вы слышите настойчивые тирады искаженного бинарного кода, похожие на глухие смешки механизмов.{/n} "Л-л-л-лорд-капитан!" {n}Голос Мастера Вокса с трудом пробивается через помехи системы.{/n} "Обна-на-наружены помехи в во-во-вокс-системе отсека. Похоже, мостик о-о-отрезало от остального к-к-корабля..."

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно из вокс-системы мостика раздается оглушительный визг. Вы слышите настойчивые тирады искаженного бинарного кода, похожие на глухие смешки механизмов.{/n} "Л-л-л-лорд-капитан! Обна-на-наружены помехи в во-во-вокс-системе отсека. Похоже, мостик о-о-отрезало от остального к-к-корабля..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binary code, like the muffled chuckles of the machines.{/n} "L-l-l-lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

{n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binary code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-l-l-lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

{n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

languages.text: {n}突然之间，舰桥的音阵系统爆发出了震耳欲聋的尖叫声。你听到了刺耳的乱码音，仿佛是机器的低笑声。{/n}“舰——舰——舰长大人！舱室的音——音——音阵系统遭到了干——干——干扰。舰桥似乎与飞船的其他区域失——失去了联系……”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，舰桥的音阵系统爆发出了震耳欲聋的尖叫声。你听到了刺耳的乱码音，仿佛是机器的低笑声。{/n}“舰——舰——舰长大人！舱室的音——音——音阵系统遭到了干——干——干扰。舰桥似乎与飞船的其他区域失——失去了联系……”

languages.text: {n}De pronto, un chillido ensordecedor brota del sistema de vocos del puente. Oyes una diatriba violenta en binario que parece una risa grave y mecánica.{/n} «Lo-lo-lo-lord Capitán! De-de-detecto in-ter-ter-terferencia en el siste-te-tema de vocos. Parece que el puente está aislado-do-do del resto-to-to de la na-na-nave...».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, un chillido ensordecedor brota del sistema de vocos del puente. Oyes una diatriba violenta en binario que parece una risa grave y mecánica.{/n} «Lo-lo-lo-lord Capitán! De-de-detecto in-ter-ter-terferencia en el siste-te-tema de vocos. Parece que el puente está aislado-do-do del resto-to-to de la na-na-nave...».

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich ertönt ein ohrenbetäubendes Kreischen aus dem Vox-System der Brücke. Man hört heftige Tiraden aus verstümmeltem binharischem Code wie das leise Glucksen von Maschinen.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terferenz d-d-d-erfasst im Vox-syste-t-tem des Abteils. Sieht so aus, als wäre die Brücke vom Rest des V-V-V-Schiffes abgeschnitten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-l-l-lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

languages.text: {n}Soudain, un son assourdissant jaillit des systèmes-vox sur le pont. Vous entendez de violentes tirades en code binhaire déformé évoquant le ricanement d'une machine.{/n} « {mf|S-S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-S-Seigneure-capitaine} ! Int-t-t-terférences d-d-d-détectées dans le compartiment des syst-t-t-tème---vox. Il semble que le pont est c-c-coupé du reste du v-v-vaisseau... »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, un son assourdissant jaillit des systèmes-vox sur le pont. Vous entendez de violentes tirades en code binhaire déformé évoquant le ricanement d'une machine.{/n} « {mf|S-S-Seigneur-capitaine|S-S-Seigneure-capitaine} ! Int-t-t-terférences d-d-d-détectées dans le compartiment des syst-t-t-tème---vox. Il semble que le pont est c-c-coupé du reste du v-v-vaisseau... »

languages.text: {n}突然、ブリッジのヴォクスシステムから耳をつんざくような甲高い音が響く。機械が低くクスクスと笑うように、文字化けしたバイナリコードで勢いよく音声が流れてきた。{/n}「ロ、ロ、ロード・キャプテン！区画のヴォクスシステムでか、か、干渉が検出されました。ブリッジは残りのヴォ、ヴォ、ヴォイドシップから、き、き、切り離されて…」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、ブリッジのヴォクスシステムから耳をつんざくような甲高い音が響く。機械が低くクスクスと笑うように、文字化けしたバイナリコードで勢いよく音声が流れてきた。{/n}「ロ、ロ、ロード・キャプテン！区画のヴォクスシステムでか、か、干渉が検出されました。ブリッジは残りのヴォ、ヴォ、ヴォイドシップから、き、き、切り離されて…」

languages.text: {n}Aniden köprünün voks sisteminden sağır edici bir cızırtı yükseliyor. Birbirinin içine geçmiş ikilidil kodların vahşi bir tiradını duyuyorsun. Makine, sanki hafif hafif gülüyor.{/n} "L... L... L... Lord Kaptan! Kompartımanın voks s... S... S... Sistemine m... M... M... Müdahale t... T...T... Tespit edildi. Görünen o ki k... K... K... Köprü, uçsuz g... G... G... G... Gemisinin kalanından koptu..."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, a deafening screech erupts from the bridge's vox-system. You hear violent tirades of garbled binharic code like the low chuckles of machinery.{/n} "L-L-L-Lord Captain! Int-t-t-terference d-d-d-detected in the compartment's vox-syst-t-t-tem. Looks like the bridge is c-c-cut off from the rest of the v-v-voidship..."
